name: Balance the Budget
description:
After a long and promising career you finally get the call. You are the one chosen, you are now chancellor of the exchequer, in charge of the government purse strings.

Before you can even get comfortable in your new office the news comes that a virus is running rampant around the globe. The worlds going crazy and you have to make the decisions about how the budget is spent. Will save lives? Save the economy? Or be over-ruled at every turn.

It a crazy time and no-one really knows what's coming next.
